scenario_text.value: Hey, Shuuji. What are you up to?
Takuma... We were thinking about each other.

I guess the stuff with Renamon really got
Shuuji thinking.
Thinking? About what?

Bonds are a difficult thing, aren’t they?
Same as with the professor’s partner.

The stronger one is, the more it hurts when
you part ways.

That day will come for me and Lopmon, too.
When I think about that...
It hurts?

Yeah. I’ve come to care for Lopmon more than
I thought I would.
I care about you too, Shuuji!

Thanks. You don’t know happy it makes me to
hear you say that.

I wonder how the professor’s partner feels..
Do you think he holds a grudge?

(...I bet he does. Still, I want to think
there’s more to the story.)
(I should tell Shuuji that I think...)
He holds a grudge.
It’s hard to tell.
He holds a grudge.

He must hold a grudge. After being left alone
for decades...

I think so, too. That’s why we can’t avoid
a fight.

Hatred and anger... Those things don’t vanish
easily.

Still, I want to believe that a bond can
overcome things like that.
Yeah. Let’s try and believe.
It’s hard to tell.

It’s hard to tell. But I think he feels more
than just hatred.
More than hatred?

I’m sure he still cares about the professor.
A part of him, anyway.

That’s pretty optimistic... Still, I hope
you’re right.

It’s too sad to think he only has hatred or
jealousy for someone so important...

But man, you’re incredible, Shuuji. Thinking
so many steps ahead...

You’re thinking ahead too, aren’t you?
I don’t think I’m anything special.
Still, you’re our leader.
You and Aoi are better leaders than I am...

At least more than I was at first. I like to
think I’ve gotten a bit better since then.
I was pretty bad at the beginning, wasn’t I?

None of us had any room to breathe when we
first got here.

Even taking that into consideration...
I wasn’t any kind of leader.

(True. I can’t say he was good at it... Even
so, he was always trying his darndest.)
(So then, what should I say to him?)
That’s not true.
That may be true.
That’s not true.
That’s not true! You’re our leader, Shuuji.
Even now, it’s still you.

I probably felt like those were some heavy
expectations...

But it’s strange... Now when I think about
those expectations, I feel motivated.
Thanks, Takuma. I’ll do my best to the end.
As a leader... No, not just a leader.

But as a person... A single person who can
save the world.
That may be true.

That may be true. Still, you’re our leader
now.
Do you think...I’ve grown a bit?
Of course! Everyone says the same thing!
I hope you’re right.

Lopmon, did I seem like a good leader from
your perspective?
Yeah! You’ve always been a wonderful leader!
Thanks.
I’ll keep being the best leader I can be!

If we save this world...there’s something I’d
like to do.
What is it?

I want to have a heart-to-heart with my dad
and brother.

I don’t think we’ve ever had a real talk,
despite being family.
I’ll convey my feelings, with my own words.
Shuuji...

Don’t sound so worried. I just want to talk
with my family, that’s all.

If we can save this world, I think I can
handle it after all this.
So I wanna do everything I can.

(I want to help him out... Still, I shouldn’t
butt into family matters.)
(I should tell Shuuji that I think...)
Good luck.
I’ll help!
Good luck.
Good luck, I’m rooting for you.

Thanks. I’ll show you I can do it, with my
own strength.
I’ll help, too!

I’m happy you want to, but...I get the
feeling they wouldn’t accept you so easily.
I’ll handle it myself.

(True. I don’t think people from our world
will accept Lopmon and the others so easily.)

You should expect good news, I promise you.
...Ah, and there’s plenty to do here first.
Let’s take care of things here for now.
Yeah!
I’ll help!

I’ll help! Sounds like a lot to handle on
your own...

No, this is a family matter, so I’ll do it
myself. That’s probably for the best.
Plus...

I get the feeling they want to hear it from
me... My dad, and my brother.
Shuuji...I understand. Still, never forget.
All of us are on your side.
Yeah. I know I’m not alone.
All right, guess I’ll finish getting ready.

You make sure you’ve got all your eyes dotted
and your tees crossed, Takuma.
Yeah!

Right, back to preparations. I hope it all
goes well!
